resources.string: Not enough values to perform operation
Error: Not enough numbers for operator %s
Error: Too many numbers left on the stack.

In this mode you can make single calculations. For example you can calculate simple single calculations such as 1 1 +. In order to use single mode enter a value with ot without a decimal point, hit NEXT, enter the second number, then hit your operator. When finished hit clear and enter a new calculation.

In this mode you can enter complex calculations as a single string. For example you can enter 15 7 1 1 * - / then hit calculate to get the result. Please ensure spaces between the values and operators. Once finished hit clear and enter a new calculation.
